title: On Stage
description: “Ladies and gentlemen, I will be entertaining you”. “I will be responsible for the emotions you feel and the inspiration you derive from this performance”.
product: “I will be responsible for the emotions you feel and the inspiration you derive from this performance”
detail_first: “Ladies and gentlemen, I will be entertaining you”. “I will be responsible for the emotions you feel and the inspiration you derive from this performance”. I am fascinated by performers who possess the courage to create works of art in the sanctuary of their studios then share them with an open audience of strangers. Courage, playfulness, a desire to inspire derived from an innate conviction of their ability to do so.
